snippet: The strike in North Waziristan was the latest in a series by C.I.A.-operated drone aircraft to coincide with a major offensive by the Pakistani military.
abstract: Pakistani officials report that American drone strike against compound in North Waziristan tribal district killed at least six people.

byline.original: By ISMAIL KHAN and DECLAN WALSH

lead_paragraph: The strike in North Waziristan was the latest in a series by C.I.A.-operated drone aircraft to coincide with a major offensive by the Pakistani military.

headline.main: U.S. Drone Strike Kills 6 in Pakistani Tribal Area
